name: Consolidator
tagline: Consolidator Tool for Popular Medical Education Software.  Visit drmapleleaf.github.io/consolidator
body:
### Welcome to the Consolidator

### PURPOSE
This bookmarklet allows you to open multiple to-dos/evaluations at the same time.  This approach saves time, bandwidth and mouse clicks for the user.

### WHAT THIS IS NOT
This bookmarklet DOES NOT automate the filling and submission of evaluations.  This bookmarklet does not pre-fill any responses to evaluations.  To suggest otherwise is a gross misrepresentation of the capabilities of this bookmarklet.

### DISCLAIMER
THE CONSOLIDATOR (\'THE SOFTWARE\') IS PROVIDED AS IS. USE THE SOFTWARE AT YOUR OWN RISK. THE AUTHORS MAKE NO WARRANTIES AS TO PERFORMANCE OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, OR ANY OTHER WARRANTIES WHETHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED. NO ORAL OR WRITTEN COMMUNICATION FROM OR INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE AUTHORS SHALL CREATE A WARRANTY. UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES SHALL THE AUTHORS BE LIABLE FOR DIRECT, INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES RESULTING FROM THE USE, MISUSE, OR INABILITY TO USE THE SOFTWARE, EVEN IF THE AUTHOR HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.

### LICENSE
The Consolidator is provided under CC-BY-NC-SA 4.0.
